<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/agent/{agent_id}/active/toggle"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

This method is deprecated. Use the `PATCH /agent_id instead
  Toggle the active status of an agent. If the agent is active, it will be
  deactivated and vice versa. The agent's ID should be provided in the path parameter

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
